name: Eriter.github.io
tagline: static site reboot for hiring adventures in 2014
body:
### I Solve Problems For You

Hi. My name's Eli, and I'm a startup guy.

I don't mean that I've worked at startups--though I have, in a variety of capacities over the last three years--but that I'm constitutionally incapable of being satisfied with 'good enough' in my professional life. I don't have an academic background in computer science, but I've built my own web apps, and worked with both new code and legacy apps serving millions of monthly users. 

I like staying up all night to call the right people in China, I like making my own stocks, I like tracking down weird bugs with UTF-8 character encoding or oauth. I like Vim golf and sustainable pace and things that, no matter how much they are overpraised, really **are** that good.

B
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
